Articles.Content:
Today, april 1st, 2018, I have sent a manned mission to the purplest planet, Eve. They are currently in an escape trajectory from kerbin. May we pray for them, as I haven't been able to have a successful mission to any of kerbin's moons before.

Album https://imgur.com/a/CAAGH will appear when post is submitted

Their objective will be to scout out Eve, and determine if any future missions need modifications past a little bit of elevator rearranging. 

As the LV-N "Nerv" rockets to the front of the ship have a tendency to overheat those back control surfaces.

Edited April 1, 2018 by Lego_Prodigy

Mission Failure. 

Cause: Deficiency of fuel.

Course of Action: with no docking ports, i must put the ship into a collision course with kerbin.

I really wanna explore eve so cheats are being used to get to eve orbit.
